resources.string: EarthView Management Limited is a leader in the management of Natural resources for the future through technology in Africa.We are an impact orientend bussiness focused on the measurement and conversation of natural resources through technology
The "EarthView Management Application" has been designed and developed for the EarthView company to help in management and billing of services .
At EarthView, we are helping utilities make the most of their water by providing solutions that help achieve water efficiency, conservation and management.
